hero.title: The MoonRise presale finances infrastructure. Not speculation.
hero.description: The MRS token is issued and delivered via smart contract on a public network, with clear phases and on-chain settlement. Acquisition in BNB/USDT (BEP-20). At the end of the presale, 100% of unsold tokens will be burned on-chain.

buttons.helper: Access full model details and the project's social audit.

network.title: Why are we on BNB Chain?
network.description1: We chose BNB Chain for its robust security, proven stability, and global liquidity. It ensures low fees, instant execution, and broad compatibility for investors.
network.description2: Our ecosystem already runs with reliability and efficiency â€” simple to join, easy to track, and fully verifiable in real time.
